hero.title: Welcome to TechFix - Your Trusted Computer Repair Shop
hero.subtitle: Fast, Reliable, and Affordable Computer Repair Services

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of services to keep your PC running smoothly.

servicesItems.title: Hardware Repair
servicesItems.description: We can diagnose and repair any hardware issues with your PC, including motherboards, CPUs, RAM, and more.

servicesItems.title: Software Troubleshooting
servicesItems.description: Our experts can help you resolve any software issues, from operating system problems to application conflicts.

servicesItems.title: Virus Removal
servicesItems.description: We can detect and remove any viruses, malware, or other malicious software that may be affecting your PC.

servicesItems.title: Data Recovery
servicesItems.description: Our data recovery experts can help you retrieve important files and documents that have been lost or deleted.

servicesItems.title: Upgrade Consultation
servicesItems.description: Our experts can help you determine the best hardware and software upgrades to improve the performance of your PC.

servicesItems.title: Network Setup
servicesItems.description: We can assist with setting up and configuring your home or office network, ensuring fast and secure connectivity.

testimonials.quote: TechFix saved my computer from a nasty virus. Their service was quick and professional.
testimonials.author: Emily R.

testimonials.quote: I upgraded my PC with TechFix and it runs like new. Highly recommend their services!
testimonials.author: James T.

testimonials.quote: Great customer service and affordable prices. My go-to place for all computer issues.
testimonials.author: Anna K.
